member.summary: The account holder number for the transaction.

member.summary: The amount received, this amount cannot differ from the authorization request amount.

member.summary: This field must be echoed back in the response message.

member.summary: Unique message ID

member.summary: Indicates whether this is a repeat of a previous transaction advice.False if this is the first advice and True if this is a repeat of an advice.

member.name: T:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.Controllers.ReverseAuthorizationController
member.summary: A ReversalAdvice used to reverse a successful authorization. This advice notifies the issuer to close the open transaction. A reversal will only be sent after an authorization. A reversal typically means that the customer opted to not continue with the transaction, or that there was failure at the point-of-sale. A reversal is never sent after a transaction has been completed (via the TransactionAdvice method).

member.summary: Client username

member.name: P:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.Models.RouteDetails.EndPointUrl
member.summary: Client endpoint url

member.name: T:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response Codes

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.APPROVED
member.summary: Successfully processed the transaction.

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.EXCEEDS_NUMBER_OF_PAYMENTS
member.summary: The number of payments allowed on an account has exceeded

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.INVALID_ACCOUNT_NUMBER
member.summary: The account number is not a valid issuer account.

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.INVALID_AMOUNT
member.summary: Incorrect amount for the issuer account.

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.INVALID_AUTHENTICATION
member.summary: Invalid login details

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.EXCEEDS_MAXIMUM_AMOUNT
member.summary: The amount exceeds the maximum amount payable

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.BELOW_MINIMUM_AMOUNT
member.summary: The amount is less than the minimum amount payable.

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.PAYMENT_NOT_ALLOWED
member.summary: Any other reason why an account number cannot be paid.

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.SECURITY_VIOLATION
member.summary: Any other security related errors

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.SYSTEM_MALFUNCTION
member.summary: System exception

member.name: F:DirectTransact.WebApi.PayAT.ResponseCode.TIMEOUT
member.summary: Processing timeout. Normally sent when the issuer connects a third party processor.
